## FDC3.addIntentListeners() method

Adds intent listeners for the specified intents.

**Signature:**

```typescript
addIntentListeners(listeners: Map<FDC3Intents, FDC3ContextHandler>): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listeners | Map&lt;[FDC3Intents](./foundation-fdc3.fdc3intents.md), [FDC3ContextHandler](./foundation-fdc3.fdc3contexthandler.md)&gt; | The intent listeners to add. |

**Returns:**

void
